name: Fire Man Big Adventure
description:
Cute Boy is very lovely.You will love her more and more when you look her.She is sensitive not only skill but also intellectually gifted.Cute Boy likes adventurous and never stop.This time,She comes to the South Pole.Snow and fog is very dangerous.Stay with her and take a big adventure together.

This game has many interesting props,such as the risk of ice,ferocious big cutter,thriller agencies etc.Have fun.
